page.title: 04FAMILY LIFE KILMARNOCK
page.content: {SATURDAY 24/8/85} I GOT UP AT 10am,GOT DRESSED AND HAD BREAKFAST,THEN I READ FOR 45 MINUTES AND AT 11.15am WE ALL WENT TO GLASGOW. WHEN WE ARRIVED WE PARKED THE CAR AND WENT TO LUNCH WE ALL HAD CHICKEN. AFTER LUNCH MY MUM AND I WENT TO THE BANK AND WE MEET MY DAD AND SISTER IN AUSTIN REEDS, WE THEN LOOKED ROUND A CAMPING SHOP. WE MOVED THE CAR TO SAUCHIEHALL STREET,PARKED,AND MUM AND I WENT TO MARKS AND SPENCER WHERE I GOT A JACKET.WE MET MY DAD AND SISTER IN THE SHOP AND BOUGHT FOOD.WE WENT FOR A CUP OF TEA AND THEN DROVE HOME(WE GOT STUCK IN A TRAFFIC JAM).WE HAD SUPPER AND I WENT OUT TO PLAY WITH A FRIEND.WHEN I CAME IN I DID MY HOMEWORK AND READ FOR 15 MINUTES WHILE LISTENING TO THE RADIO AND AT 10.30pm I WENT TO BED.
